title: Topic 004 Question 030
body: You are planning an Azure Stack Hub deployment for an enterprise customer.
You need to identify an appropriate identity model for the customer. The solution must use capacity-based billing.
Which two identity providers can you use for the customer? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) in an Enterprise Agreement (EA)
Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) in a Cloud Solution Provider (CSP) subscription
Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) in an Enterprise Agreement (EA)
Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) in a Cloud Solution Provider (CSP) subscription
